content: विष्वच्, विष्वंच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>Nom.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> {%<ab>m.</ab>%} विष्वङ्; {%<ab>f.</ab>%} विषूची, {%<ab>n.</ab>%} विष्वक्) {@--1@} Going or being everywhere, all-pervading; विष्वङ्मोहः स्थगयति कथं मंदभाग्यः करोमि <ls>U. 3. 38</ls>, <ls>Māl. 9. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Separating into parts. {@--3@} Different. {@--4@} Alternately. (विष्वक् is used adverbially in the sense of ‘everywhere, on all sides, all around’; <ls>Ki. 14. 59</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 4</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 25</ls>).
